name: Kiwi Jump (UrsaFrank)
description:
Kiwi Jump

Made as part of a self imposed 1 month a game challenge, is a small game about a kiwi wanting to fly and bouncing on mushrooms to climb as high in the sky as possible. Partial inspired by doodle jump and getting over it, the game may be short but it is challenging (I think, I didnt have time to do much play testing ¯\_(ツ)_/¯)

The zip file contains the windows executable as well as a .love file with can be played on all desktop plaforms with the LÖVE game engine (https://love2d.org/)
